episode_summary: This episode of 'No Such Thing As A Fish' covers a variety of quirky and intriguing topics, including the unusual Guinness World Record held by Mo Farah, the surprising composition of Kit Kats, the history of hamsters in the UK, and an unconventional method to treat snoring using a didgeridoo.

facts.fact: Mothara has only one Guinness world record, and it is in the 100-metre sac race.
The inside of a Kit Kat is made of more Kit Kats.
The first hamsters to come to the UK arrived in a coat pocket.
An effective way to treat snoring is to regularly play the didgeridoo.
